title: 11 Powerful Prayers for Your Husband (Christianity & Islam)

steps.content: "Lord, thank you for my husband's continued success at work! Please keep helping him succeed and let his managers be the vessel through which you reward his faithfulness with promotions and pay increases. I also ask that you keep my husband safe each day from anyone who might wish him harm. Above all, please bring him home safe and whole to me." Bible expert Olivia Woodford recommends opening all your prayers with an expression of gratitude, as "there's so much that we take for granted" – including the privilege of praying to our Creator.

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "No weapon that is fashioned against you shall succeed, and you shall refute every tongue that rises against you in judgment." Isaiah 54:17

"Father, please help my husband be strong in this difficult time. We know that you send us challenges for a reason, and we thank you for each one. But sometimes it's difficult to remember that everything – the good and the bad – comes from your Divine Will. Help him not to lose faith and hope in the promise of your redemption. Help him see to take comfort in our family, in you, and in the knowledge that this, too, shall pass."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble." Psalm 46:1

"Dear Lord, please touch my husband with your healing hand. You are the great Healer and the One who ultimately determines the outcome of every illness and injury. Please heal my husband completely, soothe every pain, and repair every broken part. Until then, please help him bear his affliction with love and trust in your wisdom and mercy."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "Praise the Lord, my soul, and forget not all his benefits— who forgives all your sins and heals all your diseases." Psalm 103:2-3

"Father, please encourage my husband by showing him the good in life. Help him see the numerous blessings surrounding him and focus his thoughts on positivity rather than negativity. May it be your will to bring joy and laughter into his life again, and help me to do my part in facilitating those feelings by being a supportive, uplifting partner."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "And we know that for those who love God all things work together for good, for those who are called according to His purpose." Romans 8:28

"God, thank you for my husband and for giving him another birthday. I can't express how grateful I am that you sought fit to bring him into this world and make him my husband (and me his partner). Let this be a joyous new year for him full of your blessings, and may he continue to be a faithful servant to you and walk in your ways."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "For we are God’s handiwork, created in Christ Jesus to do good works, which God prepared in advance for us to do." Ephesians 2:10

"Dear Heavenly Father, thank you for my beloved husband. I love him so much! When I'm not near him, I long to hear his voice and feel his touch. In your Word, you describe marriage as a sacred union, and I humbly ask that you help us to always be like two halves of one soul. Please help us to remain steadfast and loyal to one another and continue loving each other in all ways."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "Love is patient and kind; love does not envy or boast; it is not arrogant or rude. It does not insist on its own way; it is not irritable or resentful; it does not rejoice at wrongdoing, but rejoices with the truth. Love bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things." 1 Corinthians 13:4-7

"Lord, please shield my husband's mind and heart against temptation. You made each of us beautifully imperfect, and my husband is no exception. He struggles to temptations, as we all do, but he tries hard for your sake as well as me and our family. Please acknowledge his hard work on the spiritual battlefield and strengthen his resolve to never stray from you and your commandments."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "Forgive us our sins, for we also forgive everyone who sins against us. And lead us not into temptation." Luke 11:4

"Lord of all creation, please grant my husband wisdom and discernment. The world is full of strife and struggle. Evil has been mixed with good in all things, and it's getting more and more difficult to choose the most moral path. Please give him the eyes to see and the ears to hear your truth, identify the snakes and evildoers, and make the right decisions so we always walk in your glory."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "For the Lord gives wisdom; from his mouth come knowledge and understanding." Proverbs 2:6

"Father, please help my husband become wise leader for our family. I humbly ask you that whether he leads us in spirituality, financial matters, business ventures, education, or any other area of life, we will always feel secure knowing he's guided by your Word. And if he ever leads us down the wrong path, help us to remain faithful to him and encourage him to return to you, as a lost sheep returns to his shepherd."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "Remember your leaders, who spoke the word of God to you. Consider the outcome of their way of life and imitate their faith." Hebrews 13:7

"Dear Lord, please guard my husband's true friendships. Help him to cling to people who are spiritually likeminded and pure of intentions, so they don't seek to lure him into doing evil deeds or making unwise decisions. I also ask that you protect him from those deceitful people who pretend to be his friends but would betray him if given the chance."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "If either of them falls down, one can help the other up. But pity anyone who falls and has no one to help them up." Ecclesiastes 4:10

"Father in Heaven, may you help my husband to remain humble. Please don't let him became blinded by arrogance in his Earthly successes. Remind him that all his abundance and talent comes from you so that he will maintain his humility and not be sucked into the evil pleasures of the world. Please help him to be a credit to you and his family and avoid the pride that comes before a fall. I beseech you in your name, amen."

steps.title: Related Bible Verse:
steps.content: Related Bible Verse: "Therefore, as God’s chosen people, holy and dearly loved, clothe yourselves with compassion, kindness, humility, gentleness and patience." Colossians 3:12

"O God, thank you for sending me my wonderful husband. I am constantly in awe of your unending wisdom! Please protect my husband from all evil and bless him with every success in the world. This is an easy thing for you, O Great Provider. Thank you for all your blessings, seen and unseen, and for hearing my prayer on this matter.

steps.title: Related Quran Scripture:
steps.content: Related Quran Scripture: "And Allah has made for you, from that which He has created, shadows and has made for you from the mountains, shelters and has made for you garments which protect you from the heat and garments which protect you from your [enemy in] battle. Thus does He complete His favor upon you that you might submit [to Him]." Surah Nahl Ayat 81
